/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the city's daily hustle and bustle. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a corridor of urban life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the scene. The sun is setting, casting a warm glow over the cityscape, enhancing the colors and details of the buildings and trees. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky.
